effect_entries.short_effect: Teaches Round to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen IV & III: Skill Swap Gen II: Fire Punch Gen I: Rock Slide)
effect_entries.effect: Teaches Skill Swap to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.text:
歌で　相手を　攻撃する。
みんなで　輪唱すると　続けて
だすことが　でき　威力も　あがる。

The user attacks the target with a song.
Others can join in the Round and make
the attack do greater damage.

Attacca il bersaglio con una melodia. Se usata
durante lo stesso turno da più Pokémon, i danni
inflitti aumentano.

Quien lo usa ataca con una afilada garra de
sombras. Su índice de golpe crítico es muy alto.

Angriff mit Gesang. Singt der Anwender mit allen
im Kanon, kann er die Attacke mehrfach auslösen
und die Stärke steigt.

Le lanceur attaque l’ennemi en chantant.
Si plusieurs Pokémon déclenchent cette attaque
à la suite, l’effet augmente.

노래로 상대를 공격한다.
함께 돌림노래를 하면 계속해서
쓸 수 있고 위력도 올라간다.

うたで　あいてを　こうげきする。
みんなで　つかうと　れんぞくで
だせて　いりょくも　あがる。

The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round and
make the attack do greater damage.

The user attacks the target with a
song. Others can join in the Round and
make the attack do greater damage.

Le lanceur chante et attaque l’ennemi.
Si plusieurs Pokémon déclenchent cette
attaque à la suite, l’effet augmente.

The user employs its psychic power to
exchange abilities with the foe.

The user employs its psychic power to
exchange abilities with the foe.

The user employs its psychic power to
exchange abilities with the foe.

The user employs
its psychic power
to swap abilities
with the foe.

Switches abilities
with the foe on the
turn this is used.
